misdeed: A series of unexplained tremors and landslides have begun to plague a mountainous region, striking fear into the hearts of the isolated villages nestled among the peaks.
solution: The Vaesen is a Giant and can be banished by ringing church bells, raising a cross near its dwelling, or discovering and speaking its true name.

clues.description: Witnesses claim to have seen a figure of immense size silhouetted against the moonlit sky, its eyes glowing like hot coals.
Giant footprints, too large to belong to any man or beast, are found near the sites of the disturbances.
Ancient tales whisper of a slumbering giant who dwells within the heart of the mountain, angered by the intrusions of men.
A shepherd claims that his flock was scattered by a thunderous roar that seemed to shake the very foundations of the mountain.
An enormous, crudely-fashioned club is found abandoned near a collapsed mineshaft.
The tremors seem to intensify whenever the church bells ring, as if something within the mountain resents the sound.

plotTwist.description: A secretive group of miners has been using explosives to uncover a new vein of ore, unknowingly disturbing the Vaesen's slumber.
